body: It's just a slightly nicer error message in the case where you actually pass in a generator.  I spent a few minutes trying to figure out why my torch.default_generator was a torch._C.Generator and not a torch.Generator before I figured out it just rejects any object and the error message is bogus.  Now it just tells you only None is supported in that case.
